outputs.output_descr:
1.1.1.2 Strengthened and harmonized national and regional statistical information systems and databases, including development information (DEVINFO) focusing on sex-disaggregated data.
1.1.1.4 National Human Development Report (NHDR) providing practical options for population retention, income generation, gender equality and sustainable livelihoods in the Outer-Islands.
3.1.2.1 Gender-responsive disaster risk management plans at the community levels integrated into National Disaster Plans and United Nations programmes.
4.1.1.1 Gender analysis on the differential impacts of environmental degradation and climate change on men and women with input from the analysis used to support planning and programming processes.
4.1.2.1 Community and institutional MDG-based planning activities to integrate climate change and environmental challenges, including natural disaster into community development plans (refer to Outcome 1 on Eco-tourism).
4.1.3.1 Energy efficiency improved and renewable energy use promoted.

project_descr: Cook Islands Community Centered Sustainable Development Programme (CKI CCSDP)
project_title: Cook Islands Community Centred Sustainable Development
